nodes.bodyText:
Pls rename to ConnectadBidder according to our naming policy for bidders.
Also, pls rename package to org.prebid.server.bidder.connectad.

Go code allows to write check conditions like Ext.SiteID == 0 but in Java we need to make sure extImpConnectAd.getSiteId() is not NULL first.
Note: The code might be less cryptic if use Objects.equals(extImpConnectAd.getSiteId(), 0).

BidFloor field can be NULL.
Also, pls extract field value to separate variable if use more then once.
This will remove first format for all bidders. Pls make a new list.
It may be better to create a new method for adding headers here which will check values for null/empty.
May be it make sense to pass here only needed parameters instead of whole ExtImpConnectAd.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,23 @@
+adapters:
+  connectad:
+    enabled: false
+    endpoint: http://bidder.connectad.io/API?src=pbs
+    pbs-enforces-gdpr: true
+    pbs-enforces-ccpa: true
+    modifying-vast-xml-allowed: true
+    deprecated-names:
+    aliases:
+    meta-info:
+      maintainer-email: support@connectad.io
+      app-media-types:
+        - banner
+      site-media-types:
+        - banner
+      supported-vendors:
+      vendor-id: 138
+    usersync:
+      url: https://cdn.connectad.io/connectmyusers.php?gdpr={{gdpr}}&consent={{gdpr_consent}}&us_privacy={{us_privacy}}&cb=
+      redirect-url: /setuid?bidder=connectad&gdpr={{gdpr}}&gdpr_consent={{gdpr_consent}}&uid=

nodes.bodyText: Rename according to new bidder name.

Probably would be better to extract this logic to separate method like secureFrom(request.getSite()).
Also, it might be more strict if we'll check startsWith(..) instead of contains(..)

i see the code is absolutely right but LGTM thinks different.
May you pls change StringUtils.isNotBlank(page) to plain page != null?
This method can be private static.

Just an advance. Headers can be string type only, so no need to specify this in name.
Rather, we can name it as addHeaderIfValueIsNotBlank or just addHeader or similar.
PS. make it static also.
